attributes.action: help householders to save money and energy immediately by forbidding energy companies from demanding a standing payment in addition to charging for actual energy consumed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In addition a system of charging should be based on this model, which will enable householders to recover costs of energy saving measures immediately. For example -
1st. 100 units @5p per unit
next 200 units @7p
next 400 units @9p
etc/ etc. This will reduce payback time for insulation and energy-saving devices etc.and our carbon footprint more quickly.
